overview:
With more than 4 years of web applications development and management experience, Muhammad Huzaifa has developed a sharp eye for how businesses get bloated with inefficiencies, cross-purposes and miscommunication â€” and how they can retool for a sleeker, smoother, strategically focused organization.

As an young entrepreneur who quickly built his own successful Software and mobile application development business, he also empathetically helps other business owners to solve their toughest problems through technology.

AWARDS AND RECOGNITIONS:

Received award from PASHA for the best Startup Idea 2010, for startup Tagit (SMS based marketing solution). Judged and selected by Microsoft, TRG , Alchemy technologies, Mixit and Systems limited.

Received award for solution “Advanced use of QR-Code & text messaging for feedback management” from Innocentive Inc USA for Challenge #9654477 - Monitoring the Voice of the Patient Over The Internet

Developed application “Best Music Videos” for Nokia S60 devices which is used by 900,000 Nokia users.
